data.name: Application_CannotGetStepPastCurrent
data.value: Cannot request step data for step greater than the application step.

data.name: Application_Expired
data.value: Please note that your application has expired as you have taken more than {0} hours to complete it. Please click on the link below to begin a new application.

data.name: Application_ExpiredNotice
data.value: Please note that your application has expired as you have taken more than {0} hours to complete it. You may begin a new application now.

data.name: Application_NoApplicationForUser
data.value: No current application found for user id {0}.

data.name: Application_NotFound
data.value: The specified application cannot be found.

data.name: Application_StepValidationFail
data.value: Step has failed validation.

data.name: AVS_BankDetailsFailed
data.value: Your banking details failed account validation. Before you are able to complete your application your account details must be validated. Please check that you have entered the correct details.

data.name: ForgottenPassword_UserNotFound
data.value: We cannot locate the your account. Please ensure that you have entered the correct details.

data.name: PasswordReset_ResetError
data.value: There was an error resetting your password. Please request another password reset email and try again.

data.name: Validation_AccountNumberInvalid
data.value: Your account number failed validation. Please check that you have entered your details correctly.

data.name: Validation_IdNumberRegex
data.value: Please enter your ID number consisting of 13 numbers without any spaces or non-numeric characters.

data.name: Validation_RemoteVerifyFailed
data.value: An error has occurred and we are unable to verify your {0} at this time. Try again.

data.name: Validation_Required
data.value: Please complete the {0} field.

data.name: Validation_Unique
data.value: The specified {0} is already in use.

data.name: Atlas_ClientNotFound
data.value: The specified client cannot be found.

data.name: Validation_FailedObject
data.value: Failed to validate object.

data.name: Application_InvalidStatus
data.value: Application has an invalid status '{0}'.

data.name: Verification_QuestionsFailed
data.value:
Unfortunately you did not answer enough questions correctly.
Would you like to try again?

data.name: MyAccount_PasswordChangeFailed
data.value: Failed to change your password. Please check that you entered your current password correctly.

data.name: Application_CannotSelectHoliday
data.value: You have selected a Sunday or public holiday. Please select the next or previous working day.

data.name: Application_LoanAmountOutOfBounds
data.value: The amount you entered is either too large or too small. The loan amount has been adjusted.

data.name: Application_CompleteFirst
data.value: Please complete the application process.
data.comment: Displayed if user goes to quote acceptance when application does not have afforability

data.name: General_404
data.value: We cannot find that page.

data.name: General_Error
data.value: Unfortunately, a server error has occurred.

data.name: Application_LoanPeriodOutOfBounds
data.value: The loan period you entered is either too large or too small. The loan period has been adjusted.

data.name: Application_TechnicalError
data.value:
Unfortunately there has been a technical error with your loan application. We are working to resolve the problem, please try again in a few hours.
We apologies for the inconvenience caused.

data.name: Application_CannotApply
data.value: Unfortunately, you cannot apply for a loan at this time as your last application was declined. Please check again in a few days.

data.name: Application_AlreadyComplete
data.value: Your application is already complete.

data.name: Application_AlreadyPending
data.value: You may not apply for another loan as you already have a pending or active application.
